short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Noragami Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Noragami background. Noragami wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Noragami wallpapers every time you open a new tab.  
2. Randomize Noragami backgrounds or mark your favorites using the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.  
4. Quick links to your email and social media accounts.  
5. Automatically display the current date and time.  
6. Add new notes to jot down tasks or reminders.  
7. Convenient access to your most visited websites.  
8. Seamless access to your browser bookmarks.  
9. Add websites to a shortcut panel for faster navigation.  
10. Instant access to Google apps.  
11. Explore additional themes with just a click.  
12. Share content effortlessly on social media platforms.  
13. One-click download for your favorite wallpapers.  
14. Direct access to play games.  
15. Enjoy fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Noragami new tab.
